About D4PG

Data For Public Good (D4PG) is a collective space where we share insights, learnings, and have conversations on topics including; Digital justice, Afrofuturism, Data and data privacy, AI and much more. We aim to tap into the collective power of community-based changemaking through technology, democracy, and justice.

Illustration by Brit Sigh

Whether you're a data scientist, student, artist, community advocate, parent, attorney, educator or community member, we are here to host these dynamic conversations with you!

This year's theme is, Co-Powering an Emergent Horizon Part II: Reimagining Our Relationship with the Future, inspired by our co-authored article in the Stanford Social Innovation Review.

By being a part of this experience, you will:

  • Learn about resources and tools
  • Gain insight into strategies and models to activate in your communities
  • Expand your network by connecting with others
  • Join conversations about the importance of democracy in technology for protecting our civil liberties, ownership, and privacy rights

Support D4PG's Mission

Help us create transformative conversations about technology, democracy, and justice. Your support makes D4PG accessible to changemakers everywhere.

Why Support D4PG?

  • Bring more underrepresented changemakers to the table
  • Counter surveillance capitalism with community-driven alternatives
  • Build lasting networks that create systemic change beyond the D4 conference
  • Support grassroots organizers fighting algorithmic bias and digital harm
  • Amplify Afrofuturist visions of technology serving liberation
